title: Thean Kudikka Lyrics TeeJay Ft Pragathi
stanzas:
kan moodi thirakkum
nerathil vandu
theanai marandhu
nilaa rasikkuthe

thaen kudikka
time is thumping slow
thaen kudikka
my heart is pumping low(2)

if I had to choose
between loving or breathing
I will choose  my last
breath to say I Love You

rekkai enmel mulaikkuthe
un vaasam en maele
veesi oodhum pothe
thuliyaal malarnthene

en veyyil theeyaale
mazhai thoorale
kudai pudithum
un kooda nenanjen

en thaene
thaen kudikka
time is thumping slow
thaen kudikka
my heart is pumping low(2)

if I had to choose
between loving or breathing
I will choose  my last
breath to say I Love You

tholaiyaathe tholaiyaathe
oliyaama un kooda
thunaiya iruppen kannaa nee

kan moodi thirakkum
nerathil vandu
theanai marandhu
nilaa rasikkuthe

thaen kudikka
time is thumping slow
thaen kudikka
my heart is pumping low(2)

if I had to choose
between loving or breathing
I will choose  my last
breath to say I Love You
